sectionHeading: Street Closure Listing for July 3rd and July 4th Events.

location: Wilson Downing Rd between Ridgepoint Run and Allante Brook Ct
impact: Street CLOSED for utility installation.

location: Deweese St between E Short St and Elm Tree Ln
impact: Intermittent street closures for gas line installation.  Local traffic only.

location: Rose St between Ave of Champions and Kalmia Ave
impact: Alternating lane closures and intermittent complete closures for overhead cable work.

location: Versailles Rd between Trafton St and Mason Headley Rd
impact: Alternating rolling lane closures for electric utility work.  No work on Fridays.

location: Alexandria Dr between Antietam Rd and Darien Dr
impact: Alternating lane closures for construction.

location: Armstrong Mill Rd between Tates Creek Rd and Greentree Rd
impact: Outbound lane blocked for milling and paving.

location: Cardinal Ln between Clays Mill Rd and Laramie Dr
impact: Alternating lane closures for milling and paving.

location: E Maxwell St between S Martin Luther King Blvd and Rose St
impact: Alternating lane closures for overhead cable work.

location: Jefferson St at W Third St
impact: Lane closures as needed for water line work.

location: Jefferson St between W Third St and W Fourth St
impact: Intermittent road closures for water line work.

location: Longview Dr between Clays Mill Rd and Southview Dr
impact: Alternating lane closures for milling and paving.

location: N Broadway between W Vine St and W High St
impact: Outbound right lane blocked for construction.

location: N Limestone between Arceme Ave and Devonia Ave
impact: Outbound lane blocked for water line work.

location: Pasadena Dr between Clays Mill Rd and Southview Dr
impact: One lane blocked at one location for gas line work.

location: Richmond Rd at Ellerslie Park Blvd
impact: Intersection closed for about five minutes for overhead cable work.

location: S Limestone at Virginia Ave
impact: Outbound right lane blocked for underground utility work.

location: S Limestone between Administration Dr and Ave of Champions
impact: Right lane blocked for sidewalk repair.

location: W Fourth St between Jefferson St and Bourbon Ave
impact: Eastbound right lane blocked for gas line installation.

location: W High St between S Mill St and S Broadway
impact: Left lane blocked for electric utility work.

location: Zandale Dr at Bellefonte Dr
impact: Alternating lane closures for construction.

location: W Maxwell St between Oliver Lewis Way and Merino St
impact: Right lane blocked for gas line installation.

location: Woodland Ave between E High St and Central Ave
impact: One lane blocked for gas line installation.

location: W High St between Lexington Center Dr and Madison Pl
impact: Street CLOSED for major electric utility work.  Detours via Oliver Lewis Way - Jefferson St - Manchester St.

location: S Limestone between Administration Dr and Ave of Champions
impact: Right turn lane blocked as needed for sidewalk repair.

location: New Circle Rd between Tates Creek Rd and Versailles Rd
impact: Alternating lane closures in both directions for resurfacing work.  No work on Wednesday July 4th.
